Hello Team: A vendor recently released a security advisory for products that the combined bank may use. Please review the information below:
IdentityIQ 8.4 and all 8.4 patch levels prior to 8.4p2
column2: IdentityIQ 8.3 and all 8.3 patch levels prior to 8.3p5
column3: IdentityIQ 8.2 and all 8.2 patch levels prior to 8.2p8
column4: and all prior versions allows HTTP access to static content in the IdentityIQ application directory that should be protected.

Hello Team: Have any vulnerabilities been exploited in the wild: No
Is there POC code publicly available for these vulnerabilities: No
Detection: Qualys is unable to detect this vulnerability

Action: We need to assess the organizational impact. Can you please confirm if the combined bank uses this product and version and if instances are impacted? If so can you please explain an action plan to patch or mitigate the vulnerabilities.
